des: "Ahhh, this tastes just like those orange push ups you used to get at the store.  Very easy recipe that everyone will love, especially on that hot summer day."
ins: Place soda, condensed milk, whipped topping, and sugar into an ice cream maker; stir until combined.  Freeze according to the manufacturer's instructions.
